snippet.title: Legacy: Steel and Sorcery - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description:
Legacy: Steel and Sorcery is a third-person action combat adventure game developed by Notorious Studios. Players will explore a vibrant colorful land filled with enemies to slay and secrets to uncover. Take a look at the gameplay reveal trailer for Legacy: Steel and Sorcery, coming soon to PC (Steam).

#Gaming #Games #IGN
